article: Sharon wrote this when she was 16 and in the llth grade.Her goal is to become an international diplomat and peace-maker. It was my first day at school.I felt _ and scared.I went to all my classes with no _ It felt like no one _ .I listened anxiously to all the lessons and waited for lunch _ at 1:00.Then finally the bell rang.It was time to talk and have _ In the lunch line I met a new friend who wore a hijab on her head, and though I am _ .we got along fine, and I was so _ when she said, "Sit-with us, at our table." She pointed to the one next to the door. So I _ ,and took my tray and was _ to walk with her across the floor, when suddenly I felt a jog."Hey, I saw you on the bus," said a tall girl in a long skirt."I see your Jewish star necklace.You _ sit with us." At that moment I looked around, and that's when I _ ,to my surprise, the nations of the world, _ themselves.That's what I saw through my own eyes. The Spanish only sat with Spanish, the Hindus only with Hindus, the Russians always with the Russians, and _ the Arabs with the Jews. I saw the reason why _ got started.Everyone _ to their own kind.The _ was just like a map of the world, where there should never have been so much separation among nations.But why was everyone so _ ? And so I turned _ this girl, and went with the first, and there was no offence, I built a _ between two worlds when I sat with those _ from me.
